aboutUs.headLine: About us
aboutUs.paragraph: We are a team worked on this website to solve multiple problems the people face when they need to go to a doctor

saveTime.headLine: Save your time
saveTime.paragraph: Save the time you always waste at clinics waiting rooms you just need to book the time that suits your schedule by one click

findDoctor.paragraph: Search for a doctor by speciality or by name or just explore the doctors and find the one that suites your need

footer.title: Doctor Booking
footer.paragraph: A website to book doctor appointment and save you the time

FAQ.headLine: Frequently asked
FAQ.paragraph: Here is some frequently asked questions about the website, it help you to get a betteridea about the app

question1.A1: the website is for anyone that went to find doctor easily

question2.Q1: Am I required to create a acount for making an online appointment?
question2.A1: no need for a user to create an acount

question3.Q1: Can I schedule more than one appointment with a single doctor?

question4.Q1: Can I reschedule an online appointment?
question4.A1: yes, if you have an argent situation you can reschedule to anthor time

question5.Q1: How will I know if my booking is confirmed?
question5.A1: the secretary tall you to confirm the appoinment by calling or sending email

question6.Q1: should i include a name of a doctor when i want to search for a specific specialty ?

question7.Q1: What will the doctor's consultation fee be?
question7.A1: it depend on the doctor itself

question8.Q1: I am a Doctor and I have done my registration. What should I do next?
question8.A1: we send you an email that you are now in our website and user can search and find you

question9.Q1: Can I use the app for checking availability of Doctor and his fees without actually booking or scheduling an appointment ?
question9.A1: yes, while you searching, click on the doctor card that you went know about him, it open a anther page that contain doctor informaition
